title: Navigate forwards to a slider in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Rating' slider.
assertions: roleSlider nameRating textualValueZeroFiveStars numericValue0IsNotConveyed orientationHorizontal minimumValue0IsNotConveyed maximumValue5IsNotConveyed

title: Navigate backwards to a slider in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Rating' slider.
assertions: roleSlider nameRating textualValueZeroFiveStars numericValue0IsNotConveyed orientationHorizontal minimumValue0IsNotConveyed maximumValue5IsNotConveyed

title: Request information about a slider in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Rating' slider, read information about the slider.
assertions: roleSlider nameRating textualValueZeroFiveStars numericValue0IsNotConveyed orientationHorizontal minimumValue0IsNotConveyed maximumValue5IsNotConveyed

title: Increment a slider by one half star in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Rating' slider, set its value to one half star.

title: Decrement a slider by one half star in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Rating' slider, set its value to zero stars.

title: Increment a slider by one star in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Rating' slider, set its value to one star.

title: Decrement a slider by one star in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Rating' slider, set its value to zero stars.

title: Decrement a slider to the minimum value in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Rating' slider, set its value to zero stars.

title: Increment a slider to the maximum value in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Rating' slider, set its value to five stars.
